entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
